title: IDA FLAIR doesn't see sig files
content:
I've added the following sig files which were generated using flair 7.0 to ida 7.0

I want ida to find known function names from the sig files,
when I list the FLIRT signature files I don't see the sig files, why might be the problem?

Thanks.

answers_data.content:
You need to place them into a cpu specific subdirectory, e.g. 
pc
.
